input.sentences: [male] held his daughter [female] and told her stories .
yan just turned 19 yesterday | i still remember her as a little baby .
[male] was a tech wiz | he build his own computer .
he was a bit of a cheapskate though | wished he could 've build his own tv .
the dinner was delicious | lots of curry and poultry .
output.sentences: We went to a party and some guy was telling stories.
He was talking about how yesterday he met a nice girl named Yan.
She had a friend that was a total tech wiz, some dude.
He was wishing for a TV, but didn't buy one since he was a total cheapskate.
After getting him his TV, he cooked up lots of poultry, which turned into our dinner.
